entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nanisivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -35.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arctic Bay Airport 11:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Humidity: 68 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41 with temperature rising to minus 37 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41 with temperature rising to minus 37 by morning. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
